Subject: Facing issue in SSO enable & AD Authentication
Description: We are not able to Enable the SSO in EPP successfully  . If we enable it, we are unable to login in EPP neither with local credentials nor with AD credentials . Please look into and suggest on this .
What_We_Know__c: Customer have SSO issue on the EPP login.
Next_Steps__c:
We are gathering more details to check if we can apply the offline patch.

We will schedule a remote session.

In the remote session we have tested the connectivity and started the AD sync

The issue persist after the sync, so we scheduled a new meeting.

In the remote session we manage to sync the AD groups but the imported users are not able to login with AD credentials.

We will schedule a new session .
Solution_Comment__c: solved in the remote session by adding the suffix to the AD settings
